image_metadata.caption: Bridge failure at Schoharie Creek, New York, caused by excessive rains and structural failure, two topics addressed by probability. (Image courtesy of theÂ [Federal Highway Administration](http://www.fhwa.dot.gov/).)
image_metadata.image-alt: A photograph of a bridge failure in progress.  Half of the bridge has been washed away and the remaning structure appears to be crumbling.
